item.title: ‚ÄòHis life is hanging by a thread‚Äô: Doctors on fasting farmer leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal - Hindustan Times
item.description:
‚ÄòHis life is hanging by a thread‚Äô: Doctors on fasting farmer leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: HT News Desk

Farmer leader Jagjit Singh Dallewal has entered the 24th day of his fast-unto-death, pressing the government for a legal guarantee of minimum support price (MSP) for crops. His health has deteriorated significantly, and he is now in a critical condition, at risk of cardiac arrest.

Key Points:

  • Dallewal, 70, has not eaten for 24 days as part of his protest.
  • Doctors report that his health is critical, with risks of cardiac arrest and multi-organ failure.
  • The Supreme Court has criticized the Punjab government for failing to conduct timely health tests on Dallewal.
‚ÄúHis life is hanging by a thread.‚Äù - Doctors attending Dallewal

The situation is becoming increasingly urgent as his health continues to decline.

item.title: ‚ÄòMukesh Rajput‚Äôs BP still high, Pratap Sarangi a cardiac patient': Doctors on injured BJP MPs - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Injured BJP MPs Mukesh Rajput and Pratap Sarangi Hospitalized Following Parliament Scuffle

Date: Dec 19, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Two BJP MPs, Mukesh Rajput and Pratap Sarangi, were admitted to RML Hospital due to injuries sustained during a scuffle outside Parliament. Doctors reported that both MPs had head injuries and were being monitored for blood pressure-related issues.

  • Both MPs admitted to RML Hospital following injuries from an altercation.
  • Doctors stated that both sustained head injuries and have high blood pressure concerns.
  • Defence Minister Rajnath Singh visited the MPs and reported that they would remain in the hospital for observation.
  • Ajay Shukla, the Medical Superintendent, provided updates on their conditions.
  • The incident has sparked political tensions, with BJP and Congress filing complaints against each other.
‚ÄúRajput ji's blood pressure is still high. We are doing our best possible.‚Äù ‚Äì Dr. Ajay Shukla

The condition of the MPs requires careful observation following a violent confrontation that underscores ongoing political tensions.

item.title: 'Even if India vs Pakistan happens on moon ... ': Mohammad Amir on ICC Champions Trophy hybrid model - The Times of India
item.description:
Even if India vs Pakistan happens on moon ... ': Mohammad Amir on ICC Champions Trophy hybrid model

Publication Date: [Date Not Available] Source: Times of India

Mohammad Amir discussed the potential hybrid model for the ICC Champions Trophy, emphasizing that even if a match between India and Pakistan were to take place on the moon, the excitement and rivalry would remain unmatched.

  • Amir highlights the significance of India vs Pakistan matchups in cricket.
  • He supports the idea of a hybrid model for international tournaments.
  • Amir suggests that cricket's popularity transcends geographical boundaries, capturing global interest.
‚ÄúEven if India vs Pakistan happens on the moon, the rivalry will always be exciting!‚Äù

Amir‚Äôs comments reflect the deep-rooted passion and competition in cricket, specifically between these two nations.

item.title: Pakistan Tries To Arm-Twist China Over Gwadar Port. The Plan Backfires. - NDTV
item.description:
Pakistan Tries To Arm-Twist China Over Gwadar Port. The Plan Backfires.

Publication Date: Date not specified
Source: Article not specified

Islamabad attempts to leverage its relationship with China by demanding a second-strike nuclear capability in exchange for granting military access to the strategic Gwadar port, but faces rejection from Beijing.

  • Pakistan engaged in high-level talks with China regarding the Gwadar port.
  • Islamabad made a controversial demand for nuclear capabilities in exchange for military access.
  • Beijing rejected the demand and suspended discussions, signaling a downturn in diplomatic relations.
  • The Pakistani military historically relies on China for military support and economic bailouts.
  • The demand for nuclear capabilities could lead China to violate international treaties.
"By demanding a second strike nuclear capability, Pakistan is risking serious diplomatic repercussions for its obsession with countering India."

This incident signifies a challenging moment for Pakistan as it navigates its relationships with key allies while dealing with internal crises.

item.title: Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet - NDTV Movies
item.description:
Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet

Publication Date: New Delhi

The highly anticipated teaser trailer for James Gunn's new Superman film has been released, introducing David Corenswet in the iconic role.

  • The teaser shows Superman in a snowy landscape, injured, with a notable quote: "Take me home" when Krypto the Superdog approaches him.
  • David Corenswet portrays both Superman and his alter ego, Clark Kent, who works for The Daily Planet.
  • Key characters introduced include Lois Lane, Lex Luthor, and Jimmy Olsen.
  • Other DC characters making appearances include Mister Terrific, Guy Gardner, Hawkgirl, and Metamorpho.
  • James Gunn emphasizes that the new Superman embodies humanity and kindness despite being an alien.
‚ÄúThe next Superman has to be someone who has all the humanity that Superman has but he's also an alien.‚Äù - James Gunn

This film marks David Corenswet's biggest Hollywood project to date, being the fourth actor to take on the Superman role.

item.title: India vs West Indies Women LIVE Cricket Score, 3rd T20I: Mandhana‚Äôs record fifty leads IND towards 100 - The Indian Express
item.description:
India vs West Indies Women LIVE Cricket Score, 3rd T20I: IND set 218 target for WI; Richa Ghosh slams fastest fifty after Mandhana 77

Date: December 2024, Source: Indian Express

In a thrilling match, India Women set a record score of 217/4 against West Indies in the 3rd T20I. Richa Ghosh scored an 18-ball fifty, making it the joint-fastest in WT20Is.

  • India starts strong with Smriti Mandhana scoring a pivotal 77 runs.
  • Richa Ghosh's rapid fifty propels India to a formidable total.
  • The series is level at 1-1 after West Indies' win in the previous match.
‚ÄúShe wants to be the girl under pressure all the time. That‚Äôs when she‚Äôs at her best I think,‚Äù - Shane Deitz, West Indies coach.

This match sets the stage for an exciting finish in the T20I series, followed by an ODI series as part of the ICC Championship.

Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan attended Aaradhya's annual day function at Dhirubhai Ambani International School, dispelling rumors of a split by showcasing their unity and affection.

  • The couple matched in black outfits, demonstrating their solidarity amidst divorce rumors.

item.title: 'He Was Humiliated': Ravichandran Ashwin's Father Makes Stunning Claim After Legend's Retirement | Exclusiv - News18
item.description:
Ravichandran Ashwin's Father Claims Humiliation Led to Retirement

Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: News18

Ravichandran Ashwin's father has made shocking claims that his son faced long-term humiliation, contributing to his decision to retire from international cricket during India's tour of Australia.

  • Ashwin's retirement announcement took many by surprise, including his father.
  • His father suggested that a lack of a regular spot in the playing XI may have led to feelings of humiliation for Ashwin.
  • Ashwin retires as India‚Äôs second-most successful bowler in Test history with 765 wickets across formats.
‚ÄúWhat was going on in his mind I don‚Äôt know. He just announced. I too accepted it with full pleasure.‚Äù - Ravichandran Ashwin's father

The emotional impact of Ashwin's retirement was felt by his family, who had anticipated this step due to the ongoing humiliation he faced.

item.title: Pushpa 2 biggest-ever blockbuster in Hindi cinema! Ruling box office - 14 day collection details - ET Now
item.description:
Pushpa 2: Box Office Dominance and Record-Breaking Collections

Updated: December 19, 2024

Source: ET Now News

Pushpa 2 has taken the box office by storm, completing two weeks of release and on track to become the biggest blockbuster in Hindi cinema history.

  • Grossed Rs 618.5 crore net in just 14 days at the Hindi box office.
  • Fastest Indian film to reach over Rs 1,500 crore worldwide within the same timeframe.
  • Detailed box office collection includes impressive day-wise figures, culminating in a total of Rs 975 crore.
#Pushpa2TheRule is ruling the Hindi Box Office üí•üí• Collects 618.5 CRORES NETT in 14 days and is on the verge of becoming the biggest ever blockbuster in Hindi Cinema ‚ù§‚Äçüî•

Directed by Sukumar, Pushpa 2 continues to build on the legacy of its predecessor, Pushpa: The Rise, released in 2021, and features a talented cast including Allu Arjun and Rashmika Mandanna.

With phenomenal reception and record-breaking collections, Pushpa 2 is set to reshape the landscape of Hindi cinema.

item.title: Aishwarya Rai holds Amitabh Bachchan by the arm as they attend Aaradhya‚Äôs school event with Abhishek Bachchan. Watch - Hindustan Times

item.title: West Indies bowl and bring in Alleyne in for Munisar, India unchanged - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
West Indies bowl and bring in Alleyne in for Munisar, India unchanged

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Hayley Matthews won the toss and opted to bowl in the third T20I against India in Navi Mumbai, aiming to capitalize on favorable conditions and recent success in chasing. The Indian team remains unchanged, missing regular captain Harmanpreet Kaur.

  • West Indies chose to chase, influenced by dew and past performance.
  • India is changing up the batting order with Raghvi Bist and Uma Chetry as part of their squad.
  • Aaliyah Alleyne replaces Ashmimi Munisar in the West Indies lineup, adding depth as an allrounder.
"The team is willing to do whatever is needed to get that pivotal win tonight," said Smriti Mandhana, the stand-in Indian captain.

This match is crucial as it is the series decider, with both teams looking to secure a decisive win.

item.title: Polio Resurgence In Spain, Germany, and Poland; Virus Detected In Wastewater - TheHealthSite
item.description:
Polio Resurgence In Spain, Germany, and Poland; Virus Detected In Wastewater

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: The Health Site

Three countries in Europe, Germany, Spain, and Poland, reported poliovirus in wastewater, raising alarms of a potential resurgence of the deadly disease.

  • Polio Virus Detection Timeline: The presence of VDPV2 was first noted in Spain, with samples collected in mid-September. In Poland, the virus was detected in a municipal sample from Warsaw on November 18, while Germany reported findings from several cities throughout November and early December.
  • Public Health Response: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) and the World Health Organization (WHO) emphasize the importance of maintaining high vaccination rates and robust surveillance systems to mitigate the risk of outbreaks.
Although cases have significantly decreased, recent wastewater monitoring in Europe, especially in Germany, Spain, and Poland, has detected traces of the poliovirus.

This finding does not confirm an outbreak but serves as a concerning reminder of the ongoing risks associated with polio.

item.title: 'He was reassuring, like a cousin': How French rapist Dominique Pelicot taught a copycat to drug and rape - The Times of India
item.description:
‚ÄòHe was reassuring, like a cousin‚Äô: How French rapist Dominique Pelicot taught a copycat to drug and rape his own wife

Publication Date: October 2023 Source: Times of India

The article explores how Dominique Pelicot, a notorious French rapist, influenced a copycat who subsequently drugged and raped his own spouse. It examines the psychological and societal implications of such criminal mentorship.

  • Dominique Pelicot‚Äôs prison life and manipulative behavior.
  • Case of the copycat and the circumstances leading to his crime.
  • Impact of Pelicot's actions on societal perceptions of sexual violence.
‚ÄúHe was reassuring, like a cousin,‚Äù said one victim.

This incident raises concerns about the dangerous influence of incarcerated criminals on others, especially in relation to sexual violence and personal autonomy.

item.title: "You Will Be Chief Minister Someday": Devendra Fadnavis Tells Ajit Pawar - NDTV
item.description:
You Will Be Chief Minister Someday: Devendra Fadnavis Tells Ajit Pawar

Date: August 12, 2024 | Source: NDTV

Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis expresses support for Ajit Pawar's dreams of becoming Chief Minister during a legislative assembly session.

  • Fadnavis, Ajit Pawar, and Eknath Shinde plan to work in shifts.
  • Fadnavis acknowledged Ajit Pawar's ongoing ambitions and offered encouragement.
  • Ajit Pawar recently became the Deputy Chief Minister for the sixth time.
  • Pawar's faction broke from the Nationalist Congress Party and joined the BJP-led government.
  • The NCP faction led by Pawar saw electoral success in recent assembly elections.
  • The Mahayuti alliance significantly outperformed the MVA coalition in election results.
‚ÄúYou are called 'permanent deputy CM'... but my wishes are with you... you will be the Chief Minister someday.‚Äù - Devendra Fadnavis

This dialogue highlights the ongoing ambitions of Ajit Pawar within Maharashtra's political landscape, indicating potential future leadership opportunities.

item.title: Can infectious bird flu linger in refrigerated raw milk? Here‚Äôs what the study reveals - The Times of India
item.description:
Can Infectious Bird Flu Linger in Refrigerated Raw Milk? Here‚Äôs What the Study Reveals

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Times of India

Recent research explores the potential risks associated with the presence of infectious bird flu in refrigerated raw milk, sparking concerns over food safety and public health.

  • The study investigates the survival of bird flu viruses in raw milk under refrigeration.
  • Findings indicate that certain strains may remain viable, raising questions about contamination.
  • Experts suggest heightened surveillance in dairy processing environments.
  • Recommendations for pasteurization and food handling practices to mitigate risks.
‚ÄúThe implications of this study could reshape our understanding of avian influenza transmission through dairy products.‚Äù

This study emphasizes the importance of safe food handling practices and ongoing monitoring for the presence of infectious diseases in food supplies.

item.title: 7 pictures from space that show how Earth changed in 2024 - India Today
item.description:
7 Pictures from Space Showing Earth's Changes in 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 Source: India Today

This article showcases how Earth's landscape has changed significantly in 2024 through stunning images captured from space.

  • Cyclone Chido, a Category 4 storm, struck Mayotte with 225 km/h winds, causing severe damage.
  • Record-breaking heat in the Northern Hemisphere led to multiple deaths and power strain during summer 2024.
  • Astronauts captured images of Turkmenistan's unique geography, including its dunes and oil industry.
  • The San Juan Islands are highlighted for their geology and fossil-rich marine state park.
  • Japan's autumn hues were delayed due to above-average heat.
  • Australia's Willandra region showcases historical megafauna remains amidst its landscapes.
  • A photograph focuses on the illuminated towns of Namibia and South Africa and how they are affected by desert and industry.
‚ÄúCyclone Chido devastated Mayotte with 225 km/h winds caused widespread damage.‚Äù
‚ÄúRecord-breaking heatwaves caused deaths and extreme temperatures across many cities.‚Äù

The images and stories presented highlight the urgent and ongoing changes on our planet, reflecting both the beauty and challenges faced by Earth in 2024.

Italian PM Meloni Defends Friendship With Elon Musk

Date: December 19, 2024 Source: News18

Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni addressed her friendship with Elon Musk, clarifying that their relationship does not compromise her leadership or influence her policies.

  • Meloni defended her friendship amidst rumors of a romantic relationship.
  • She stated, "I don‚Äôt take orders from anyone," affirming her commitment to her role as Prime Minister.
  • The relationship came under scrutiny following their frequent meetings since Meloni's government took power.
  • Musk awarded Meloni the Global Citizen Award, leading to viral speculation about their personal relationship.
  • Meloni's government is advancing regulations benefitting the space sector, potentially generating significant investments.
‚ÄúI don‚Äôt take orders from anyone.‚Äù - Giorgia Meloni

In conclusion, Meloni emphasizes her independence and commitment to governing Italy while maintaining relationships with global leaders like Musk.

item.title: United States confirms first ‚Äòsevere‚Äô case of H5N1 avian flu from backyard poultry - Down To Earth Magazine
item.description:
First Severe Case of H5N1 Avian Flu in the US Linked to Backyard Poultry

Publication Date: December 13, 2023 | Source: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)

A patient from Louisiana has been hospitalized after being diagnosed with a ‚Äòsevere‚Äô case of avian influenza A (H5N1), marking the first report of such a case in the United States traced to exposure from backyard poultry.

  • Patient had exposure to sick and dead birds in backyard flocks.
  • Total of 61 human cases of H5N1 reported since April 2023, with most presenting mild symptoms.
  • Wisconsin reported a presumptive positive human case pending CDC confirmation.
  • Viral genome analysis shows the virus belongs to the D1.1 genotype, linked to recent cases in the US and Canada.
  • CDC notes that sporadic cases, while rare, can occur from multiple sources including backyard flocks.
‚ÄúThis case underscores that, in addition to affected commercial poultry and dairy operations, wild birds and backyard flocks also can be a source of exposure,‚Äù stated the CDC.

The increase in H5N1 cases emphasizes the need for continued monitoring of avian influenza, particularly in connection to backyard poultry.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office: Allu Arjun Cancels Aamir Khan‚Äôs 3,640 Days Old Record Despite Being The Toughest Nut To Crack! - Koimoi

  • On its 14th day, the movie earned ‚Çπ17 crore, the highest collection for a Hindi film on that day.

item.description:
Ravichandran Ashwin's Mother In Tears As India Star Returns Home After Shock Retirement. Video

Date: December 19, 2024 | Source: NDTV

Ravichandran Ashwin made headlines with his unexpected retirement from international cricket. Following his announcement, he returned to Chennai where his family welcomed him emotionally.

  • Ashwin announced his retirement during the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.
  • He returned to Chennai amidst an emotional welcome from family and neighbors.
  • Ashwin's mother was seen crying upon his arrival, illustrating the significant emotional impact of his decision.
  • He concluded his career with 537 wickets in Tests, highlighting his stature as a cricketer.
  • Ashwin expressed a desire to continue playing at the domestic and club levels.
"There's a bit left in me as a cricketer but I would like to exploit it at the domestic and club-level cricket." ‚Äî Ravichandran Ashwin

This retirement marks the end of a significant era in Indian cricket, with Ashwin remembered as an all-time great.
